def turn(state):
    # New question.
    results = set()
    for config in getsets(idxs, 7):
        for a,b,c,d,e,f,g in permutations(config):
            check_abcde_large = all([is_large(dot, ctx) for dot in [a,b,c,d]])
            check_abcde_dark = all([is_dark(dot, ctx) for dot in [a,b,c,d]])
            check_ef_medium = all([is_medium_size(dot, ctx) for dot in [e,f]])
            check_ef_grey = all([is_grey(dot, ctx) for dot in [e,f]])
            check_g_medium = is_medium_size(g, ctx)
            check_g_light_grey = is_light(g, ctx) and is_grey(g, ctx)
            if (
                check_abcde_large
                and check_abcde_dark
                and check_ef_medium
                and check_ef_grey
                and check_g_medium
                and check_g_light_grey
            ):
                results.add(frozenset([a,b,c,d,e,f,g]))
    return results
